title: Possessive Pronouns
description: Use words that demonstrate ownership of multiple objects, and use them to form questions to ask other people.

lesson.instruction: When referring to a plural number of items, the noun changes.
When you are part of a group that owns something, use etu.
When using certain family words like mothers (mama), fathers (baba), sisters (dada), and friends (marafiki) in the plural, the possessive word is zangu.
